documents.title: Publication: Letter from Lord Livermore to Lord Vaux regarding factors considered when deciding which firms should maintain a Minimum Requirement for Own Funds and Eligible Liabilities (MREL) above minimum capital requirements, given that resolution is in the public interest should public funds be used rather than money from industry.
documents.description: Bank Resolution (Recapitalisation) Bill [HL]: Letter from Lord Livermore to Lord Vaux regarding factors considered when deciding which firms should maintain a Minimum Requirement for Own Funds and Eligible Liabilities (MREL) above minimum capital requirements, given that resolution is in the public interest should public funds be used rather than money from industry.

documents.title: Publication: Letter from Lord Livermore to Lord Moylan regarding whether the costs of litigation would be in scope of Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) levies under the new mechanism, as discussed during the Second Reading.
documents.description: Bank Resolution (Recapitalisation) Bill [HL]: Letter from Lord Livermore to Lord Moylan regarding whether the costs of litigation would be in scope of Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) levies under the new mechanism, as discussed during the Second Reading.

documents.title: Publication: Letter from Lord Livermore to Baroness Kramer regarding the previous government’s management of the failure of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) UK and the impact of this on the ring-fencing regime.
documents.description: Bank Resolution (Recapitalisation) Bill [HL]: Letter from Lord Livermore to Baroness Kramer regarding the previous government’s management of the failure of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) UK and the impact of this on the ring-fencing regime.
